## setOrPush() function

Set a map key to a new array or push to the existing value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function setOrPush<TKey, TVal>(map: Map<TKey, Array<TVal>>, key: TKey, val: TVal | Array<TVal>): void;
```

|  --- | --- | --- |

|  val | <code>TVal &#124; Array&lt;TVal&gt;</code> |  |

`void`
